survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction with home office equipment and identify areas for improvement to enhance productivity and comfort in remote work setups.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office chair?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly display.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office chair?

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Consider adding 'Other' option if needed.
